data.title: The Fabula Nova Crystallis Series on Xbox
data.meta_description: The Fabula Nova Crystallis Series consists of 4 games containing 157 achievements worth a total of 4,000 Gamerscore. View your total score for the series here
data.text:
Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2024: Games at their lowest-ever price

The Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2024 is massive, and to help you find the best deals, we’ve listed all the Xbox games on sale at their lowest-ever price.

Posted 25 days ago by Sean Carey

Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2024 now live with over 1,300 discounts

The Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2024 is live, and with over 1,300 discounts across games, bundles, DLC packs, and more, it’s safe to say that this one is massive.

Posted 28 days ago by Jack Watling

Xbox Countdown Sale 2023: Games at their lowest ever price

The Xbox Countdown Sale 2023 is a monster, and to help you find the best deals, we've listed everything that's currently on sale at its lowest ever price.

Posted 8 months ago by Sean Carey

Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2023 now live with almost 1,000 discounts

The massive Xbox Ultimate Game Sale 2023 is now live with huge discounts across a range of Xbox games, bundles, DLC packs, and more.

Posted 1 year ago by Jack Watling

Microsoft considered purchasing Square Enix to bolster Xbox Game Pass

Newly-published documents from Microsoft's trial against the FTC have revealed that Microsoft considered purchasing Final Fantasy developer Square Enix back in 2019 to bolster Xbox Game Pass.

Posted 1 year ago by Sean Carey

Xbox Star Wars and Golden Week sales now live

A special Star Wars Day sale and the Xbox Golden Week sale are now live on the Microsoft Store, offering big discounts on various games, including Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga and Like a Dragon: Ishin.

Posted 1 year ago by Sean Carey
